title: I'll play minecraft song歌詞翻譯，求回復^^
author: qwer3456
txt_content:
本帖最后由 qwer3456 于 2013-7-25 17:52 编辑 

這是本人我第一次的翻譯作品
希望各大大能給個回復，指點一下。
我今天翻譯的是I'll play minecraft song






This world's in motion lit by glowstone
這個世界因為有螢光石的存在而做動
Trees and crops n' obsidian blocks
樹和作物、黑曜石塊
Countless dramas mind that lava
再挖礦時遇見岩漿，發生戲劇性的事
Run inside it's getting darker
因此跑到黑暗的室內
Pigs and sheep, an exploding Creeper
豬和羊，一隻會爆炸的爬行者
This caves getting deeper and deeper
這個洞窟真的非常非常深
I'll push the button and the redstone clicks
我按下按鈕並啟動紅石
Flint and Tinder gets the fires lit now
燧石和火種把東西燒光吧!
The snow falls white deepest oceans blue
雪降在蔚藍的海洋
Hope no Enderman's looking back at you
希望沒有末影人在後面看不出去
Don't give him a second gaze, just look the other way
別給他分秒的破綻、只要看其他地方就好
Then craft yourself a diamond blade to keep safe
自己合成鑽石劍去保護自己
And if there's one thing that I know
如果我知道
Its a ravine or a dungeon, or a stronghold I will go
有個要塞或地牢，那我就會前往
So all told, it's time to pack my things for some adventuring let's go!
所以，我告訴你這是一段冒險的旅程。走吧!
Coz when they ask, Ill play Minecraft
當他們問我我在玩我的世界時的感想
All day and night, this world is mine
整天在玩，這是挖礦的世界
To live in perfect harmony
為了生活的完美和諧
In 16 - Bit reality
在16像素的現實
Depths of the Nether to the end of The End 
去深處的地獄，並到終界做個了結
You're looking kinda down, i'll cheer you up my friend
你看起來失落了，我讓你重新振作並成為我的朋友
Soon you'll see
你將會發現
Get a seed land and sea and sail across that sea with me. 
使用種子、只有小島和海並航行過這座海來和我在一起
There's nothing in this world that i can't change
這裡沒有甚麼我值得去改變
Without a pick or a shovel or an iron blade
沒有鎬和鏟子和鐵斧頭
We go block by block do you like what you see?
你看見了嗎?這裡除了方塊還是方塊
Well then i dig your style if you know what i mean
你挖出你的風格，你知道我的意思
Take away all the bad times
當你處在失敗之時就快閃吧!
Just leave me with the best
只在我最好的時刻離開我。
A world set for adventure
這個世界本來就為了冒險
Where to mine and craft is the best quest yet!
我一直無法追求最好的礦和合成方式
